greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, a(2) = 1, for n > 2, if A079559(n) = 0, a(n) = 2*a(A256992(n)), otherwise a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A256992(n)).
comment: Note the indexing: the domain starts from 1, while the range includes also zero.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
